title: Live Maint and Ranked
body:
So I started a ranked match just then, chose lissandra, went mid.
Top got first blood blah blah blah
I start lagging like hell, I die
Get kicked out of the ranked match
Try to log back on and now my patchers updating and it's on 33% wih over 470 files "scanned" wtf riot

replies.body: Now it's scanned over 1800 files...what is this
